metadata.description: Collection of Claude Code skills for development, debugging, testing, productivity, and AI/ML workflows

plugins.name: algorithmic-art
plugins.description: Creating algorithmic art using p5.js with seeded randomness and interactive parameter exploration

plugins.name: artifacts-builder
plugins.description: Suite of tools for creating elaborate, multi-component claude.ai HTML artifacts using React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui

plugins.name: brainstorming
plugins.description: Use when creating or developing, before writing code or implementation plans - refines rough ideas into fully-formed designs

plugins.name: brand-guidelines
plugins.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to artifacts

plugins.name: canvas-design
plugins.description: Create beautiful visual art in .png and .pdf documents using design philosophy

plugins.name: changelog-generator
plugins.description: Automatically creates user-facing changelogs from git commits

plugins.name: clean-code-checker
plugins.description: Helps check and optimize code according to Clean Code principles

plugins.name: competitive-ads-extractor
plugins.description: Extracts and analyzes competitors' ads from ad libraries

plugins.name: condition-based-waiting
plugins.description: Use when tests have race conditions - replaces arbitrary timeouts with condition polling

plugins.name: content-research-writer
plugins.description: Assists in writing high-quality content with research, citations, and real-time feedback

plugins.name: defense-in-depth
plugins.description: Use when invalid data causes failures - validates at every layer data passes through

plugins.name: dispatching-parallel-agents
plugins.description: Use when facing 3+ independent failures - dispatches multiple agents to investigate concurrently

plugins.name: domain-name-brainstormer
plugins.description: Generates creative domain name ideas and checks availability across multiple TLDs

plugins.name: executing-plans
plugins.description: Use when given complete implementation plan - executes in controlled batches with review checkpoints

plugins.name: file-organizer
plugins.description: Intelligently organizes files and folders by understanding context and automating cleanup

plugins.name: finishing-a-development-branch
plugins.description: Use when implementation is complete - guides completion and presents integration options

plugins.name: frontend-design
plugins.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality

plugins.name: hugging-face-dataset-creator
plugins.description: Creates and publishes datasets to Hugging Face Hub with proper formatting and metadata

plugins.name: hugging-face-evaluation-manager
plugins.description: Manages model evaluations on Hugging Face with result tracking and comparison

plugins.name: hugging-face-paper-publisher
plugins.description: Publishes research papers as Hugging Face model cards with code and data links

plugins.name: image-enhancer
plugins.description: Improves image quality by enhancing resolution, sharpness, and clarity

plugins.name: invoice-organizer
plugins.description: Automatically organizes invoices and receipts for tax preparation

plugins.name: internal-comms
plugins.description: Resources for writing internal communications like status reports, newsletters, and updates

plugins.name: lead-research-assistant
plugins.description: Identifies high-quality leads for products and services by analyzing target companies

plugins.name: meeting-insights-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyzes meeting transcripts to uncover behavioral patterns and communication insights

plugins.name: mcp-builder
plugins.description: Guide for creating high-quality MCP servers that enable LLMs to interact with external services

plugins.name: model-trainer
plugins.description: Trains and fine-tunes models with automatic logging, checkpointing, and Hugging Face integration

plugins.name: raffle-winner-picker
plugins.description: Picks random winners from lists, spreadsheets, or Google Sheets for giveaways and contests

plugins.name: receiving-code-review
plugins.description: Use when receiving code review feedback - requires technical rigor and verification

plugins.name: requesting-code-review
plugins.description: Use when completing tasks or before merging - dispatches code-reviewer subagent

plugins.name: root-cause-tracing
plugins.description: Use when errors occur deep in execution - traces bugs backward through call stack

plugins.name: sharing-skills
plugins.description: Use to contribute skills upstream via pull request - guides branching, committing, and creating PR

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Guide for creating effective skills that extend Claude's capabilities

plugins.name: skill-share
plugins.description: Creates new Claude skills and automatically shares them on Slack using Rube

plugins.name: slack-gif-creator
plugins.description: Creates animated GIFs optimized for Slack with proper constraints and validation

plugins.name: subagent-driven-development
plugins.description: Use when executing implementation plans - dispatches fresh subagent per task with code review

plugins.name: systematic-debugging
plugins.description: Use when encountering bugs - four-phase framework ensuring understanding before solutions

plugins.name: template-skill
plugins.description: Template skill for creating new skills

plugins.name: test-driven-development
plugins.description: Use when implementing features - write test first, watch it fail, write minimal code to pass

plugins.name: testing-anti-patterns
plugins.description: Prevents testing mock behavior, production pollution, and mocking without understanding

plugins.name: testing-skills-with-subagents
plugins.description: Verifies skills work under pressure by applying RED-GREEN-REFACTOR cycle

plugins.name: theme-factory
plugins.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with 10 pre-set themes or generating custom themes

plugins.name: using-git-worktrees
plugins.description: Creates isolated git worktrees with smart directory selection and safety verification

plugins.name: using-superpowers
plugins.description: Use when starting any conversation - establishes mandatory workflows for finding and using skills

plugins.name: verification-before-completion
plugins.description: Use before claiming work is complete - requires running verification commands

plugins.name: video-downloader
plugins.description: Downloads videos from YouTube and other platforms for offline viewing or archival

plugins.name: web-artifacts-builder
plugins.description: Suite of tools for creating elaborate claude.ai HTML artifacts using React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui

plugins.name: webapp-testing
plugins.description: Toolkit for interacting with and testing local web applications using Playwright

plugins.name: writing-plans
plugins.description: Use when design is complete - creates comprehensive implementation plans with exact file paths

plugins.name: writing-skills
plugins.description: Guide for writing effective skills with progressive disclosure design principles
